hints.content:
$\blue3\pink6$ has $\blue3$ tens and $\pink6$ ones.

$\blue6\pink3$ has $\blue6$ tens and $\pink3$ ones.  

$\blue6\pink4$ has $\blue6$ tens and $\pink4$ ones.

$\blue9\pink3$ has $\blue9$ tens and $\pink3$ ones.

The least number is $36$ because it has $3$ tens and $6$ ones.

The greatest number is $93$ because it has $9$ tens and $3$ ones.
Here are the numbers in order from least to greatest: $36$, $63$, $64$, $93$.
